name: Duality of Decisions
description:
You play as the leader of a medieval fantasy city and need to make decisions for growth. You have a lot of different races to keep in harmony with each other. There is two sides to every decision. You play with up and down arrow! 

Credit: 

Copium productions:

Design: Rasmus Köhler

Programming: Jakob Söderström

Art: Vilma Kingsepp
